name: Billionaire's Dilemma
description:
Billionaire's Dilemma is a game where you need to spend your money before it buries you alive!

Wade through a steadily growing sea of cash as you find new computers with various purchases.  Gain a better perspective on just how much 100 billion dollars really is!

This is the final game in my 10 Games in 10 Weeks challenge.  We made it!!!

Follow me on Twitter to see what comes next!
